name: Sahuagin Champion

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The champion has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
text: The champion can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
text: The champion can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The champion makes three attacks with its spear, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

description:
Those sahuagin warriors who prove themselves through heroic acts are given both title and status. Sahuagin champions often serve as lieutenants in the sahuagin army, as they do in The Final Enemy.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 249
